description.value:
Starting at 3rd level, you always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels in this class, as shown in the Alchemist Spells table. These spells count as artificer spells for you, but they donâ€™t count against the number of artificer spells you prepare.

Artificer Level Alchemist Spells
3rd @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.zwc0n5O3Dfg8cwwg]{Healing Word}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.jl2cfJWH5fXqR8nf]{Ray of Sickness}
5th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.Nkf2Stq9iJcEvO4A]{Flaming Sphere}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.TeDhEacnUuJjEMdX]{Melf's Acid Arrow}
9th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.z63Web95PUpDmIOB]{Gaseous Form}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.lFSThD582H4mzi5k]{Mass Healing Word}
13th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.5T6YkH0115J3oAsg]{Blight}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.3x7HVJ1Ube01KuDI]{Death Ward}
17th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.pgfEb63k38KiSHoh]{Cloudkill}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.WI98cTP5mCQzI7U4]{Raise Dead}

Note: After adding these spells to your character, set Preparation Mode to Always Prepared.

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
